scientific_name: Buddleja davidii 'PIIBD-III' FIRST EDITIONS PSYCHEDELIC SKY

description: The Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii 'PIIBD-III' FIRST EDITIONS PSYCHEDELIC SKY) is an amazing addition to any garden. With its psychedelic purple, lilac, and sky blue flower clusters, it offers a stunning visual impact. It blooms for months, from late spring to fall, and its fragrant flowers attracts a variety of butterflies and hummingbirds. Its foliage is gray green and long lasting. The shrub is also drought tolerant and fast growing. It's a great choice for any garden and requires little maintenance. All in all, the Butterfly Bush's colorful and distinct look makes it a must have for any landscaping enthusiast.
